name: The world's number and share of vaccinated one-year-olds
title: The world's number and share of vaccinated one-year-olds

sources.name: WHO (2017) and UN Population Division (2017)
sources.dataPublishedBy: WHO's Global Health Observatory and UN Population Division

resources.path: The world's number and share of vaccinated one-year-olds .csv

fields.name: Share of one-year-olds with BCG (tuberculosis) immunization (WHO, 2017)

Number of one-year-olds with BCG (tuberculosis) immunization (WHO, 2017)
fields.description: The number of one-year-olds was obtained by multiplying the share of vaccinated one-year-olds as recorded by the WHO Global Health Observatory with the number of one-year-olds as recorded by the UN Population Division.
